This is an amazing game, very cool concept and the story is really amazing from the first time you get into the game. Multiplayer is also an extremely fun time with friends. Looking forward to continuing this game. Would recommend I bought it during the summer sale for $0.99 it is the best deal I've ever got, this game is definitely on my top 10 of all time.

ES UN BUEN JUEGO
ğŸ‘

Despite having 50 hours in this game I've only ever beat it once (most of the time was spent on multiplayer) so when I noticed that I didn't remember ANYTHING from the main game, I decided to give it another playthrough. 

Compared to the first one, this one is way more focused on story. A lot of time is not spent in testing chambers, but rather around the whole facility.
The enviroments are rich with soul and personality (or lack there of) and are stunning to look at. Traversing around them feels like you're in a movie and it's exhilarating to find your way out of the situations (they) put you in. 
Short version: This is the best looking source game to date.

This game is 100% worth a try if you haven't played it yet. I can recommend it to ANYONE who plays video games.
one of the best and most entertaining games ive played.

I have played both games twice. They have become a Classic from the moment they released! Great games, portal 2 is my personal favourite from all of Valve games. Great introduction to the game's mechanics, simple but good writen story with a lot of mystery. The community maps are awsome and give the game replay value. Also, there is a ton of easter eggs from the half life universe. 5 out of 5 Stars.
